dt: {bc}one that sets a {a_link|trend} {bc}someone or something that starts or helps to popularize a new fashion, style, movement, etc.

dt.t: Every ten years or so, for a different set of reasons each time, cultural {wi}trendsetters{/wi} rally behind one musician with whom they sense a bond and who then comes to symbolize jazz to the mass media.
The county has become a {wi}trendsetter{/wi} in other types of environmental legislation …

shortdef: one that sets a trend : someone or something that starts or helps to popularize a new fashion, style, movement, etc.
